<title>Organ-on-a-chip Research Platform Optimization for Biotech Company— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Discover how we helped a large biotech company revamp its organ-on-a-chip research platform. We redesigned the interface and rebuilt some of its features from scratch. Our team also integrated Stripe, enabling the client to charge subscription fees." />
